data.text: As you wait for #BiharElection2020 results read a history of caste politics in Bihar, from the 1920s Janeyu Movement & Triveni Sangh, Ram Manohar Lohia, the JP Movement & Karpoori Thakur to the making of Lalu Prasad Yadav & Nitish Kumar. #BiharPolls #Bihar https://t.co/bYQ8v490aC https://t.co/71s1CzY0MT

data.text: @saumyadadoo It is of course silly when someone wants to celebrate Kamala Harris's victory as a achievement for their caste.
